comments.author: Alan Woodward
comments.body: This patch corrects the DocsAndPositionsEnum iterator logic to deal with cases where term offsets are stored in the postings lists.  It also changes the advanced constructor from private to protected, to allow subclasses to store term offsets.

comments.author: Michael McCandless
comments.body:
I just committed this.

Thanks Alan!

description: Fix the logic for retrieving term offsets from DocsAndPositionsEnum on a MemoryIndex, and allow subclasses to access them.
summary: Make term offsets work in MemoryIndex
